'''Beta 1.16.210.61''' is the eleventh and final beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.210]], released on February 24, 2021,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360057007012|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.16.210.61 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=February 24, 2021}}</ref> which fixes minor bugs.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
* Fixed a crash that could occur when using Code Connection.
* Fixed the map in offhand blocking the view when opening inventory in several Marketplace worlds.</onlyinclude>
